issues.message: Inefficient data processing loop could consume unnecessary CPU cycles
Event listeners not properly cleaned up on component unmount
O(n²) sorting algorithm could be optimized to O(n log n)

recommendations.title: Implement Virtual Scrolling
recommendations.description: Use virtual scrolling in data grids to reduce memory usage and improve performance with large datasets

recommendations.title: Add Code Splitting
recommendations.description: Implement code splitting to reduce initial bundle size and improve loading performance

recommendations.title: Optimize Bundle Size
recommendations.description: Remove unused dependencies and optimize webpack configuration for smaller bundles
